name: Lady Bug Match-3 Puzzle Game - Addictive & Fun Games In The App Store
name_original: Lady Bug Match-3 Puzzle Game - Addictive & Fun Games In The App Store
description: Ladybugs Match 3 is a great new twist on the puzzle genre.  Form blocks of 3 blocks by sliding tiles over to make blocks disappear.  Form a row of 6 hocks for a super move.  Extra power ups will help you along the way but watch out, time is running out.  Fantastic and addictive fun that will keep you on the edge of your chair for hours.  Get it today.
